      • loadLunchFromRSS

        private static java.lang.String loadLunchFromRSS(java.lang.String urlString,
                                java.lang.String root,
                                java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String desc,
                                boolean reprintTitle)
        XML-pattern: Title The dish
        Parameters:
        urlString - An URL String pointing to an XML document containing the lunch RSS.
        root - The tag name of the root element containing the lunch
        title - The tag name of some title, if set to null, the title element will be skipped.
        desc - The tag name of some description, if set to null, the description element will be skipped.
        Returns:
        An HTML string containing what is for lunch today.

      • loadInfo

        public static se.chalmers.h_sektionen.containers.InfoContainer loadInfo(Context con)
        Parameters:
        con - An Android context
        Returns:
        An InfoContainer object containing a list of ContactCard objects, a string containing links and a string containing opening hours.
